CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 10, 1955, pg. 10, reads: "The Lee Family...gathered at the home of Mr. and Mrs. Luvernis Lee, Pittsburgh socialites, got together to welcome James Lee and his daughter Tonia from Los Angeles, Calif. A party for more than two hundred guests sparkled on the social scene during their visit.  Snapped the night of the affair were, left to right, Mrs. Henrietta Lee Evans, New York (sister), Mrs. Luvernis Lee and Mr. Lee, James Lee and daughter Tonia, and a Lee sister.  Mrs. Bertha Ward of Falls Church, Va.  Standing are Mrs. Julia Denny of falls Church and Louis Evans of New York. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait seated left to right; Henrietta Lee Evans, Mrs. Luvernis Lee, Mr. Lee, James Lee (standing), Tonia Lee, and Bertha Ward with Julia Denny and Louis Evans standing in background, posed in home of Luvernis Lee with large mirror and mantel with clock reading 12:10, another version
